import {useState} from 'react' import {useNavigate} from 'react-router-dom' import './index.css' const UploadData = () => { const [title, setTitle] = useState('') const [media, setMedia] = useState(null) console.log(title) console.log(media) const mediaHandler = event => { let mediaDetails = event.target.files setMedia(mediaDetails) } return (

Upload Media

Title Of Event setTitle(event.target.value)} placeholder="Enter Title of Media..." className="input title" id="title" type="text" />
) } export default UploadData
